name: Elizabeth Johnston
text: Still incredibly slow at the Demotropolis location, but they're the only ones that do the Star ID. Went to the Michael Blvd location yesterday during lunch time and was immediately called for my ticket- but they don't do the star ID there. She told me to be at this location at 7am on Wednesday because that's the best time. Waited outside for the doors to open at 7, still took 30 minutes. Girl in line behind me was also there for her Star, so she didn't get called till I left 30 minutes later. They should have more than one person doing Star ID, if this is so important. They need to learn some efficiency from the Michael Blvd location.

name: Stephanie Bryant
text: They want you to call, you call & call & call & either can’t get through or it just rings & rings - USELESS!!!

name: Donald Willard
text: They were very helpful in get my problem solved especially the officer that helped.

name: Cary Reams
text: Why are there such staggering, amazingly long lines at this place EVERY SINGLE DAY?!?!  We are new to the Mobile area - and I drive by this place every day on the way to work - even at 7:00 am - every day - there are lines wrapping around this building - there are people packing the parking lot - I finally had to Google this just to see what this place was!  I was shocked to see that it’s the DMV!  Clearly People there is a need here that is NOT being adequately met!  Why on Earth would there be such massive lines every day starting in the wee hours of the morning?!?  Heaven forbid the day when I need to get a drivers license or some other type of municipal service here! This place just seems shameful! As a new Alabamian - I am embarrassed!!!

name: Deborah Smith
text: The day I went to get my driver’s license transferred from another state to Alabama the time span I had to wait was not due to having a lot of people there it was that all the lines just did not have people being processed through the lines and the only line that Was really moving was the reinstatement of your license. There was no sense of urgency to process people in and out more training with time management.

name: Rebecca Crosby
text: Wish I could give -5 stars. I've been here 3 hours and if my math is correct, I've got another 3 to go before they call my number. SEVERELY under staffed. One lady is literally just wandering around aimlessly, contributing nothing to the goal of this department. Pretty sure she took a 2 hour lunch at one point. I suggestyl you arrive on a weekday at least 30 minutes before they open if you don't want to waste your entire day.

name: Carrie Robertson
text: They are taking every precaution to keep social distancing.

name: Mark J.
text: Showed up on a Friday once and it was horrible. There was a line out the door. This last time, though, I showed up on a Tuesday at 2pm and there were only like 5 customers. All of the employees were really nice too. I was actually very impressed. The staff said that the best time to go is in the Fall, during a fair, or during Mardi Gras. During those times, people are busy with other things.

name: Cdrifter0
text: Don't call it's an endless loop of no one answering and no info for anyone getting a motorcycle endorsement

name: Paul Campbell
text:
Get in line by 7:00 a.m. to cut your wait down to under four hours.
DO NOT BRING CHILDREN. THEY WILL BE MISERABLE.
Be prepared to suck in everyone's second hand smoke.

name: Kizzie Richardson
text: Always a long wait but hey I’m patient

name: Cary Gainey
text: Very fast and courteous. In and out in less than 5 minutes.

name: Baltazar C. Balthazar
text:
Quick, steady experience.
Social Distancing was in full effect.

name: Jason Glenn
text: Fast service. In and out in less than 30 minutes.

name: Robin Jordan
text: Ms.Vanessa was a joy to deal with. Made the whole reinstatement process a lot easier

name: Eric Anderson
text: they were friendly and proficient. This office is the best out of the other I've used in the past.

name: Margaret House
text: Very nice fast and good

name: Roxanne Tinch
text: It wasn't crowded and my business was handled efficiently.

name: Michelle Watts
text: The person waiting on me was very nice and professional..my issue was taken care of quickly and it was very reassuring.

name: Deejae Richardson
text: Call numerous times. No answer

name: Quavardis Morrell
text: Mrs Freda is amazing!

name: JD West
text: They STILL won't answer the phone!!

name: TheRealValet Key
text: NO ONE ANSWERS THR DOG ON PHONE!!! BEEN CALLING FOR 5 HOURS!!!!

name: Boost3d X
text: Nobody ever answers the phones

name: Quavious Holloway
text: No one answer the phones
